definitions.definition: A weight training exercise where one lifts a loaded barbell off the ground from a stabilized bent-over position.
Any lift performed without help or leverage.
An effort made under discouraging conditions.

main_definition: ( weightlifting ) A weight training exercise where one lifts a loaded barbell off the ground from a stabilized bent-over position.
secondary_definitions: Any lift performed without help or leverage.
( figurative , by extension ) An effort made under discouraging conditions.
